title: Cosmetic Surgery Associates

<map name="1840978" theme="prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Cosmetic Surgery Associates" id="1"><topic position="379,0" order="0" id="2"><text><![CDATA[Our method, located in Bethesda, Maryland provides the most recent in
 cosmetic surgery procedures in a safe, caring environment. Dr.
 Richards, Dr. Jabs, and Dr. Magge are board certified, completely
 trained plastic surgeons focusing on the art and science of cosmetic
 surgery. They have the prestigious certification of Advanced
 Qualification in Cosmetic Surgery and have performed countless
 successful operations on patients similar to you. They are members of
 the American Society of Plastic Surgeons and the American Society for
 Aesthetic Plastic Surgery and have actually served as President of The
 National Capital Society of Plastic Surgeons.

From the moment you enter the office, throughout your consultation and
 later in all of your dealings with our staff you will certainly be
 treated courteously with attention lavished on making your desires for
 an improved appearance come true. An attentive personnel that pamper
 you and treat you as family set our technique apart. We invite you to
 browse our Photo Gallery to see prior to and after photos of the
 procedures we perform. We look forward to seeing you and invite you to
 schedule a consultation to read more about how we can help you achieve
 your goals.
]]></text></topic><topic position="-352,0" order="1" id="3"><text><![CDATA[6430 Rockledge Dr Suite #100 Bethesda MD 20817 United States

301-493-4334

https://cosmeticplastics.com/

info@cosmeticplastics.com

]]></text></topic></topic></map>
